alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 4:09PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Worcester, east central Hampshire, southeastern Franklin and east central Hampden Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near West Brookfield, or 16 miles east of Amherst, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Leominster, Shrewsbury, Holden, Palmer, Spencer, Leicester, Ware, Rutland, Sterling, West Boylston, Westminster, Barre, Warren, Paxton, North Brookfield, Hubbardston, Boylston, West Brookfield and Brimfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
